abstract: New York Yankees are reportedly close to trading pitcher Aroldis Chapman for top prospects.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs may be interested in trading a Class-A shortstop for Chapman, who is one of baseball’s best closers.

headline.main: Yankees May Deal Aroldis Chapman for a Top Prospect
headline.print_headline: Yankees May Deal Chapman to Cubs

snippet: The Chicago Cubs may be interested in trading a Class-A shortstop for Chapman, who is one of baseball’s best closers....
